meaningMnemonic: You make a <kanji>distinction</kanji> between people and based off that you <kanji>separate</kanji> the people. This is terrible! Why so much <vocabulary>discrimination</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
